report_data.Post or Account Link: People say federalism will divide the country. But we’ve already been divided by war. It’s time to make those lines official and protect ourselves. Each sect needs its own region, its own administration. We can’t keep trusting those who betrayed us. Let the Alawites manage their mountains, the Sunnis rebuild the cities, and the Kurds preserve their culture in the northeast. Forced coexistence is a lie that only benefits the powerful.
